mapper.select: select id, username, password, real_name, nick_name, birthday, sex, email, phone, type, organ_id, position_id, remark, disabled, create_time, create_user, create_client, update_time, update_user, update_client from test.sys_user where id = #{id}

select id, username, password, real_name, nick_name, birthday, sex, email, phone, type, organ_id, position_id, remark, disabled, create_time, create_user, create_client, update_time, update_user, update_client from test.sys_user limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into test.sys_user(username, password, real_name, nick_name, birthday, sex, email, phone, type, organ_id, position_id, remark, disabled, create_time, create_user, create_client, update_time, update_user, update_client) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{nickName}, #{birthday}, #{sex}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{type}, #{organId}, #{positionId}, #{remark}, #{disabled}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{createClient}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateClient})
mapper.update:
update test.sys_user
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
real_name = #{realName},
nick_name = #{nickName},
birthday = #{birthday},
sex = #{sex},
email = #{email},
phone = #{phone},
type = #{type},
organ_id = #{organId},
position_id = #{positionId},
remark = #{remark},
disabled = #{disabled},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_user = #{createUser},
create_client = #{createClient},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
update_client = #{updateClient},
where id = #{id}
